about_the_game:
This Demo is a cut down version of the Full Game that will be released in Early Access shortly after the Steam 'Next Fest'. The release is a low poly first person platformer in VR. It is inspired from the old platformers from the 8 bit and 16 bit era but brought into the present with VR.

The demo consists of:

Cut down Main Menu (A few options are greyed out)
Worm Hold travel
Start Scene

and one level which has an extra added area for players to try out some physics that will be in one of the levels in the full game.
The cinematic cutscenes are not in this demo but here is the storyline:

The character you play as has an addiction to a 3D Platformer with the same name is this title. He spends hours every night playing until the early hours. He is so addicted he even has merchandise and posters from the game in his room. One night after a long gaming session he goes to bed, he is only asleep for a short time as he gets awakened with an explosion sound. He awakens with a jump to find smoke in his room and what looks like a holographic portal emitting from one of his computer screens. He gets up to investigate and find himself being drawn into the portal and travelling through a wormhole inside his computer...

He appears on the other side after exiting the wormhole and finds himself inside the game he plays, AND that he is now the lead character. He then has to assist the friendly NPC's by ridding their game world from Ogleath and his Rogue army. The player then has to battle through various levels, defeating the enemies in different ways, climbing walls, rocks and mountains, abseiling, driving cars, controlling remote controlled cars, using physics and portals...

At the end of each level a portal will appear either freely or after you have solved a puzzle or defeated a boss guarding the portal.. each portal gives you access to the next level and a way to progress. You are trapped inside this game until the end.

The aim is to defeat the army and the bosses, and eventually face Ogleath and defeat him. Only once Ogleath and his army are defeated can you then travel safely back to your own dimension, your own reality through another wormhole and resume life once more.
detailed_description:
Wishlist for a discount on release

If you wishlist the game, you will get a 20% discount during the launch and release of the full game.

fullgame.name: The Journey into the Virtual Void

name: The Little Journey into the Virtual Void Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1650
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2080

short_description: An action packed, low poly first person platformer based on the Retro days of gaming BUT in Virtual Reality!
